name: Color Chaos (itch) (NathanCoffey)
description:
The game runs poorly for me in Chrome, but Firefox and Edge seem fine. Use whatever works for you!

An endless arcade-style game made in less than 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. The theme for the jam was "joined together." All assets, scripts, and features were created during the time period, aside from the background music. BGM is "Game Over" by Danijel Zambo from uppbeat.io. 

This was my first non-academic game jam, and I had a blast. It was definitely stressful at times, but I learned so much about a wide variety of game dev subjects. I will most definitely be participating in more game jams in the future.

Works with controller/keyboard. Controller doesn't work in the menus right now for some reason. There is a very annoying, loud, high pitched noise that happens after each collectible pickup noise. I have no clue why this is happening, it was not a problem in the Unity player.  I am continuing to look for a solution.

I'm horrible with titles, if you've got something more fun than this I would be more than willing to change it :)
